title: Inter Milan vs Real Madrid live stream: how to watch Champions League online from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: Two European giants clash at the San Siro
article: For the second season on the trot, these two giants of Italian and Spanish soccer have been drawn together in the group stage of the Champions League - but which team will get the early upper hand this time out? Follow our guide as we explain how to watch a Inter Milan vs Real Madrid live stream and catch all the action from the UCL, no matter where you are in the world today right now - including ways that you can watch for FREE.
Inter will be trying to exorcise the bad memories of last year's competition, which saw them finish bottom of the group with Real beating them in both their home and away fixtures.
Both teams have lost figurehead stars in the interim, with Internazionale selling Romelu Lukaku to Chelsea and Madrid losing their talismanic centre-back and skipper Sergio Ramos to PSG.
With both teams having managed to keep a single clean sheet in their domestic leagues so far this season, a goalless stalemate looks highly unlikely tonight.
So expect plenty of goals at the San Siro - here's how to watch a Champions League Inter Milan vs Real Madrid live stream today from anywhere in the world.

We've set out below all the ways you can watch tonight's Champions League action in a number of countries around the world. However, if you're away travelling for work or pleasure, you probably won't be able to watch tonight's match like you normally would at home.
That's because of the pesky digital restriction that is geo-blocking, whuich prevents certain streaming services being accessible only in the region that they're based in.
Help is at hand however if you run into this issue with the option of using a VPN to tune to your preferred coverage no matter where you are in the world.
